JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Elisabeth Steiner;George Nicolaou;Khanlar Hajiyev;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen
TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE ( GPE ) . She was represented before the ORG by ORG , a lawyer practising in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by PERSON , Representative of GPE at ORG .
The facts of the attack at the applicant ’s house are disputed by the parties .

According to the applicant , on DATE federal forces carried out an air strike on GPE . A missile hit the applicant ’s house at CARDINAL FAC , completely destroying it and causing injuries to the applicant . The applicant submitted that her grandson was also wounded .

The applicant submitted CARDINAL undated notes which , according to her , had been issued by ORG district hospital ( the signatures and stamps are unreadable and the notes do not have letterheads ) . The note in respect of the applicant states that she had presented herself at the hospital “ after the air strike of DATE ” and had been diagnosed with splinter wounds to her left shoulder , body and legs .

On DATE an expert from the ORG construction company and the applicant co - signed a damage certificate ( дефектный акт ) . The certificate described the damage to the house situated at FAC in GPE caused by flooding on DATE . It estimated the destruction of the CARDINAL - room house built of sun - dried bricks with metal roofing at PERCENT . It indicated the size of the house at QUANTITY ( CARDINAL LOC , of QUANTITY ) , plus a covered part of the yard with an area of QUANTITY .

On DATE the Urus - Martan district administration issued a note to the effect that the applicant ’s household was situated at CARDINAL FAC in GPE . The household measured QUANTITY . m , including CARDINAL sq . m of habitable space , and had been entirely destroyed on DATE as a result of a direct hit by an aviation bomb .

The Government submitted that no air strike had been carried out on GPE on DATE . They conceded that an air strike had been carried out in DATE on a target in the vicinity of GPE , but argued that the circumstances of the attack on the applicant ’s house had not been established .

On DATE the Commander in Chief of ORG wrote to ORG at the ORG and informed him that there were no documents to confirm the carrying out of a special operation by the army or the deployment of aircraft on DATE in GPE . At the same time , the Government referred to the copy of the expert report , which had concluded that the fragments collected at the applicant ’s house had belonged to a CARDINAL-mm artillery shell ( see below ) . They argued that this shell could have been launched either by the military or by illegal armed groups active in the district .
On DATE the Urus - Martan District prosecutor ’s office opened a criminal investigation in respect of deliberate destruction of property .
On DATE the investigation was suspended as no suspects had been identified .
On DATE the prosecutor ’s office informed the applicant that the case would be transferred to a military prosecutor , as the alleged offence had been committed by military forces .

On DATE the prosecutor ’s office of ORG transferred the applicant ’s case to the military prosecutor ’s office of ORG . On DATE the latter informed the applicant that her complaint had been forwarded to the military prosecutor ’s office of military unit no . CARDINAL .

On DATE a prosecutor of the unit wrote to the applicant that on DATE federal air forces had attacked a ORG base situated DATE kilometres to the south of GPE . The attack had been carried out by military aircraft based in GPE [ GPE region ] . The navigation system used by the air forces allowed a margin of error of CARDINAL kilometres .

On DATE the prosecutor ’s office of GPE informed the applicant that on DATE they had set aside the decision of DATE to suspend the investigation . They further noted that they had sent the case to ORG prosecutor ’s office and had ordered it to carry out a number of investigative measures , in particular to interview the applicant , to grant her the status of victim and civil claimant , and to assess the pecuniary damage inflicted .

In their observations of DATE the Government referred to the statements made by the applicant given on DATE and submitted that she had been accorded victim status on DATE . According to the Government , during the questioning the applicant stated that she had learnt from other villagers that her house had been destroyed by a bomb . No transcript of this statement or of the decision to accord victim status has been provided .

On DATE ORG центр МВД Чеченской PERSON ) produced an expert report in respect of over CARDINAL pieces of metal collected at the applicant ’s house . The report concluded that the fragments were parts of CARDINAL artillery shells , fired from a gun of the same calibre .

The Government informed the ORG that the investigation into the attack had been adjourned and reopened on several occasions and that the latest decision to adjourn the proceedings had been taken on DATE . They submitted that the applicant had been informed of all the relevant decisions taken in the case but had failed to submit any complaints or requests , and had not asked for access to the file . No documents related to the investigation after CARDINAL DATE had been submitted by the parties .

On DATE CARDINAL of the applicant ’s neighbours drew up a list of belongings which on DATE had been destroyed by a missile which struck her house at QUANTITY Street . The list was co - signed by the head of the local municipality .

On DATE the applicant brought an action for damages against ORG . Neither the applicant nor the Government submitted any documents related to these proceedings ; however they described their progress in the following manner .
On DATE the applicant ’s lawyer obtained information from ORG about the average price of QUANTITY of residential property in GPE during DATE and DATE .

On several occasions DATE and DATE the hearings at ORG of GPE were adjourned due to the applicant ’s failure to appear . On DATE the court rejected the applicant ’s claim . The hearing took place in the applicant ’s absence , at her request . The applicant did not appeal against this decision . The ORG stated that a copy of the decision had been sent to the applicant ’s representative on DATE .

The applicant stated that she had not received a copy of the said decision , and that her previous representative , PERSON , had died on DATE . It does not appear that she had taken any steps to obtain a copy of the decision at any stage , to appeal against it or to seek reinstatements of the terms of appeal .

The Government submitted in their observations of CARDINAL DATE that the applicant had obtained compensation for the property lost as a result of the attack . Without providing copies of any documents or indicating the dates on which these events had taken place , they submitted that the assessment carried out by the local ORG construction company had estimated the applicant ’s losses to the house and property at MONEY ( RUB ) . Under the procedure provided for by Government Decree No . CARDINAL ( see Relevant national law below ) , the applicant had been paid compensation of RUB CARDINAL for the lost real estate and RUB CARDINAL for personal belongings .

The applicant submitted a copy of the assessment report of unclear date produced by the ORG construction company , which calculated damages to the house and property at FAC at RUB CARDINAL . She did not comment on the issue of compensation apparently paid to her on the basis of this assessment .

The Federal Law on Suppression of Terrorism of DATE ( Федеральный закон от CARDINAL июля DATE г. № CARDINAL « О борьбе с терроризмом DATE “ the Suppression of Terrorism Act ” ) , as in force at the relevant time , provided as follows :
“ For the purposes of the present ORG the following basic concepts shall be applied :
... ‘ suppression of ORG shall refer to activities aimed at the prevention , detection , suppression and minimisation of consequences of terrorist activities ;

‘ counter - terrorist operation’ shall refer to special activities aimed at the prevention of terrorist acts , ensuring the security of individuals , neutralising terrorists and minimising the consequences of terrorist acts ;

‘ zone of a counter - terrorist operation’ shall refer to an individual terrain or water surface , means of transport , building , structure or LOC with adjacent territory where a counter - terrorist operation is conducted ; ... ”

“ On the basis of the legislation and within the limits established by it , damage may be caused to the life , health and property of terrorists , as well as to other legally protected interests , in the course of a counter - terrorist operation . However , servicemen , experts and other persons engaged in the suppression of terrorism shall be exempted from liability for such damage , in accordance with the legislation of GPE . ”

Governmental Decree no . CARDINAL of DATE established the right of all permanent residents of GPE who had lost their homes and any possessions in them after DATE to receive compensation in the amount of RUB CARDINAL for their home and RUB CARDINAL for possessions .
